text.section: In addition to any tax imposed under § 11-102 of this title, except as provided in subsection (b) of this section, a tax is imposed on the use, in the State, of electricity that is not delivered by a public service company.

The special use tax on electricity does not apply to the use of:
electricity that is:
used for residential purposes; or
used exclusively for emergency back-up generation; or
on-site generated electricity.
